name: Silentlamb.GitHub.io
body:
### Blog

The whole website is under construction right now. I'm working my way to blogging mostly about programming related stuff I discover every day. The most common topic is going to be game development. I don't work in this field of software engineering, but I rather treat is as my off-work hobby.

I have no idea when this site is going to be finished as I want to test static content generators first, like Pelican.

### Topics

- Game development (Ludum Dare, my toy engine and the roguelite top-down shooter development diary)
- ASCII-Arts, Pixel arts (archive/gallery of my arts)
- Calisthenics (if I find the articles intresting for potential readers, and keep my motivation up and running)

### Contact

You may contact me via twitter [@loginavailable](https://twitter.com/loginavailable).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
